name: RoboSync
description:
RoboSync is an immersive puzzle game that puts your logical thinking skills and precision to the test.

In each level, you'll find robots moving in unsynchronized patterns. Your mission? Time the release and blockage of passages just right, coordinating your robots' movements to unlock all the locks simultaneously.



It's crucial to carefully consider every move, executing commands precisely to achieve flawless synchronization. With progressively challenging levels, the game introduces new mechanics to keep the experience engaging.



Solve the challenges swiftly to earn the coveted 3 stars and attain impeccable synchronization for a special medal in each level. Get ready for an exhilarating journey where your mental agility will be constantly challenged."
